plot: A documentary on the history of transportation, from primitive tribesmen transporting burdens by pole and on their heads, to the modern truck of 1918.
title: The Triumph of Transportation
plot_es: A documentary on the history of transportation, from primitive tribesmen transporting burdens by pole and on their heads, to the modern truck of 1918.
plot_en: A documentary on the history of transportation, from primitive tribesmen transporting burdens by pole and on their heads, to the modern truck of 1918.
